following.description: I run a made-up company called Fiction. Publisher of The Manual, organiser of Build, and co-organiser of xoxo. Well, manager. We just say manager.
Hi.
Editorial and content strategist. Reader. Writer. Blue canary in the outlet by the light switch.
Designer by day, designer by night.

Author, Designing With Web Standards. Founder, Happy Cog™ studios (happycog.com). Publisher, A List Apart Magazine (alistapart.com), A Book Apart (abookapart.com). Host, The Big Web Show. Co-founder, An Event Apart web conference (aneventapart.com).
Writer, editor, designer & publisher. Co-founder of A Book Apart, former editor at A List Apart, and Communications Director at Typekit.
Head of design for Rdio. Really very tall.
